name: Polar Data Catalogue
description: An online database that describes and provides access to diverse data sets generated by Arctic and Antarctic researchers. It includes metadata and data from a wide range of disciplines including natural sciences, policy, health, and social sciences, and supports Canadian Arctic and Antarctic research and monitoring communities.
owner_name: Canadian Cryospheric Information Network (CCIN) in collaboration with ArcticNet, Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO), and other Canadian and international partners
